text: Many people are interested to know more about Gavin Newsom’s wife, the current First Partner of California. A member of the Democratic Party, Newsom is currently serving as the 40th governor of California. Here are all the key details about Gavin Newsom’s wife, how they met, and their relationship history. Who is Gavin Newsom married to? Gavin Newsom is married to Jennifer Siebel Newsom. Jennifer Lynn Siebel was born on June 19, 1974, in San Francisco to parents Kenneth F. Siebel Jr. and Judy Siebel. She earned her Bachelor of Arts degree in Latin American studies in 1996 and Master of Business Administration in 2001, both from Stanford University. What is Jennifer Siebel Newsom’s job? Jennifer Siebel Newsom is a documentary filmmaker and actress. She discovered her knack for acting while she was pursuing her MBA from Stanford. Following her graduation, she moved to Hollywood and bagged small roles in several films and television series. It was during that time when she founded her own production company, named Girls Club Entertainment. A distinguished documentary filmmaker, Jennifer Newsom is perhaps best known for directing Miss Representation. This 2011 documentary focuses on the role of media in the underrepresentation of women in positions of power. Another critically acclaimed documentaries made by Newsom include The Mask You Live In (2015). She has also produced several other movies and documentaries like The Great American Lie, The Hunting Ground, Fair Play and more. Gavin and Jennifer Siebel Newsom’s relationship history Gavin Newsom met Jennifer Siebel in October 2006, shortly after his divorce from his previous wife, Kimberly Guilfoyle. They were set up for a blind date by Kathy Wilsey, a mutual friend of the couple. They were attending the annual Artists Ball at the Yerba Buena Center for the Arts at the time. After dating for a year, Gavin popped the question to Jennifer while they were vacationing in Hawaii. The pair finally tied the knot on July 26, 2008, in Stevensville, Montana. They have four children together.
html:
Many people are interested to know more about Gavin Newsom’s wife, the current First Partner of California. A member of the Democratic Party, Newsom is currently serving as the 40th governor of California.

Here are all the key details about Gavin Newsom’s wife, how they met, and their relationship history.

Who is Gavin Newsom married to?

Gavin Newsom is married to Jennifer Siebel Newsom.

Jennifer Lynn Siebel was born on June 19, 1974, in San Francisco to parents Kenneth F. Siebel Jr. and Judy Siebel. She earned her Bachelor of Arts degree in Latin American studies in 1996 and Master of Business Administration in 2001, both from Stanford University.

What is Jennifer Siebel Newsom’s job?

Jennifer Siebel Newsom is a documentary filmmaker and actress.

She discovered her knack for acting while she was pursuing her MBA from Stanford. Following her graduation, she moved to Hollywood and bagged small roles in several films and television series. It was during that time when she founded her own production company, named Girls Club Entertainment.

A distinguished documentary filmmaker, Jennifer Newsom is perhaps best known for directing Miss Representation. This 2011 documentary focuses on the role of media in the underrepresentation of women in positions of power. Another critically acclaimed documentaries made by Newsom include The Mask You Live In (2015). She has also produced several other movies and documentaries like The Great American Lie, The Hunting Ground, Fair Play and more.

Gavin and Jennifer Siebel Newsom’s relationship history

Gavin Newsom met Jennifer Siebel in October 2006, shortly after his divorce from his previous wife, Kimberly Guilfoyle. They were set up for a blind date by Kathy Wilsey, a mutual friend of the couple. They were attending the annual Artists Ball at the Yerba Buena Center for the Arts at the time. After dating for a year, Gavin popped the question to Jennifer while they were vacationing in Hawaii. The pair finally tied the knot on July 26, 2008, in Stevensville, Montana. They have four children together.
